content: When you regain control, head into the stagnant shallow pool of water, where you’ll find a few Jade Lotus to harvest. Over on the right, the source of the arrows you became riddled with will become apparent, as a nearby ridge is lined with Rat Archers who will fire long salvos of flaming arrows from above.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge'.
The content is as follows:
When you regain control, head into the stagnant shallow pool of water, where you’ll find a few Jade Lotus to harvest. Over on the right, the source of the arrows you became riddled with will become apparent, as a nearby ridge is lined with Rat Archers who will fire long salvos of flaming arrows from above.
